General.Name: Rajratan Global Wire Limited
General.Description: Rajratan Global Wire Limited engages in manufacturing and sale of tyre bead wires in India and Thailand. The company also offers high carbon steel wires that are used in various industries including construction, engineering, and automobile industries. Rajratan Global Wire Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Indore, India.

0.Name: Mr. Sunil  Chordia BSc., DCMA, MBA
